newsitem.title: USA: Applied Power to buy Hormann Security.
newsitem.headline: Applied Power to buy Hormann Security.

text.p: Applied Power Inc said Thursday it signed a letter of intent to acquire the stock of Hormann Security Systems Ltd for about $10 million in cash.
The acquisition is contingent on successful due diligence and the signing of a definitive purchase agreement and is expected to close within 45 days.
Hormann, headquartered in Cork, Ireland, assembles electronic equipment, and has sales of approximately $30 million.
Applied Power said the acquisition strengthens its European presence and provides skills that it needs to develop the North American custom enclosure business.

Applied Power has three business segments, including Technical Environments and Enclosures, which configures technical equipment and provides enclosures for electronic equipment. Its Engineering Solutions segment supplies components and systems based on hydraulic and vibration control technologies. Distributed Products provides industrial and electrical tools and accessories.
